values: 处理；交易；分配；发放；给予；对待；讨论；经营；施予；发牌；应对；管理；协商；分派；操作；执行；发出；供应；发生；涉及
交易；协议；约定；待遇；一揽子交易；分配；木板；大量；份额；交易量；局面；冷杉木；发牌；坏运气；不公平的对待；（某届政府执行的）特定政策

word_mean_info__list.difference: 口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。
普通用词，含义广。既可指某种具体的商业又可指广泛的贸易。
多指买卖双方通过谈判、协商就商品质量、数量、价格等项达成协议所成的生意。
多指大规模的买卖或易货关系。
指包括售货、购货、换货在内的综合商业活动，方式可以是批发或零售。

word_group.brief_definition: 许多的, 大量的, 很
达成交易；订个协议；做个交易
许多的, 大量的, 很
(在商界或政界)工于心计, (以不正当的方式)进行纷繁复杂的交易, 周旋
达成的协议, 决定了的计划

bilingual.source: How would you deal with the situations described in the posts?
bilingual.target: 你会如何处理帖子中描述的情况？

bilingual.source: There is less fear of getting ill because people know how to deal with the ordinary diseases.
bilingual.target: 对生病的恐惧减少了，因为人们知道如何处理普通疾病。

bilingual.source: We need to deal with these rejects.
bilingual.target: 我们需要处理这些不合格品。

bilingual.source: Can you deal with this task by yourself?
bilingual.target: 你能自己处理这个任务吗？

bilingual.source: They will deal with the paperwork tomorrow.
bilingual.target: 他们明天会处理这些文件。

bilingual.source: He needs to deal with the problem immediately.
bilingual.target: 他需要立即处理这个问题。

bilingual.source: We need a broker to handle this deal.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个经纪人来处理这笔交易。

bilingual.source: She knows how to deal with difficult customers.
bilingual.target: 她知道如何处理难缠的顾客。

bilingual.source: We need to deal with these surplus materials.
bilingual.target: 我们需要处理这些多余的材料。

bilingual.source: You can use a file to deal with these burrs.
bilingual.target: 你可以用文件工具来处理这些毛刺。

list.abstract: DEAL，全称DEAL IN CITY，是于2005年11月15日创立的一个已售卖鞋为主的店面。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, cause now I have to go down there and deal with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，因为我得到银行找他们处理。

yingyinNormal.en: They would help me deal with the problem at hand, and they would give me principles for dealing with similar problems in the future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种态度帮助我处理眼前的问题，在未来碰到类似问题时有了处理的原则。

yingyinNormal.en: No, honey please, I've got, I've just have so much to deal with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要，亲爱的，拜托，我要处理的事情太多了。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've been courting her for months to let me handle the deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经向她献殷勤好几个月让她允许我来处理这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: We brought you back to deal with this. What are you going to do? Wait. Wait?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们找你回来就是为了处理此事，你打算怎么做？等。等？

yingyinNormal.en: You should deal with your father. He needs you. You know what? I don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你应该处理一下你爸爸的事情，他需要你，你知道吗？我不需要你了。

yingyinNormal.en: If I were you, I'd just call someone to pick you up and deal with the car in the morning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我是你，我就打电话找人来接我，等明天早上再处理那辆车。

yingyinNormal.en: Double it. She's a hooker. No point in playing coy. If this doesn't work, we'll punt her to behavior. Let them deal with it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再加倍，她是妓女，没必要故作娇羞，如果没用，就踢给行为部门让他们处理。

yingyinNormal.en: If you saw them free of the distortions produced by your ego or your blind spots, you would be able to deal with them more effectively.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你能客观的看待他们不受自负和盲点的左右，就可以更高效的处理他们。

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever success I've had in life has had more to do with my knowing how to deal with my not knowing than anything I know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论我在生活中取得了什么成功，与我已有的知识无关，而是关乎于我知道如何处理自己的无知。

yingyinNormal.en: Most people mistakenly treat these situations as being unique, and deal with them without having proper perspective or principles to help them get through them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大数人错以为这些情况很独特所以在处理时没有正确的眼光和法则进行指导和帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: While that perspective might sound very philosophical, I found that it was very practical, because it showed me how I could deal with my own realities in a better way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种看法听起来可能很哲学，但我觉得非常实用，因为我看到了处理现实的更好的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: We have both put a great deal of effort and thought into how to handle Russia. I'd like for this to be a decision we make together, instead of an impulsive response.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对如果处理俄罗斯都耗尽心思和努力。我希望这次我们能共同做决定,而不是冲动地回应……

yingyinNormal.en: Does he know you know? No. 'Cause, honestly, I'm not ready to deal with it. I would like to be a little less devastated, if that is possible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她知道你已经知道了吗？不，因为说实话，我...我还没做好准备来处理这事，我想让自己看起来不那么崩溃，如果可能的话

yingyinNormal.en: For example, I observed that most everything happens over and over again in slightly different ways. Some in obvious short-term cycles that are easy to recognize, so we know how to deal with them, like the 24-hour day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如我发现几乎所有的事都在不断重复稍有不同。有的周期短显而易见容易识别，所以知道怎么处理像每天24个小时。

yingyinNormal.en: Through it, I encountered reality, and I learned how to deal with it, which inspired another one of my most fundamental principles which is that truth is the essential foundation for producing good outcomes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过这个过程我认识了现实，学会了如何处理它，并由此激发了我最基础的法则之一，即真理是获得良好结果必不可少的基础。

yingyinNormal.en: Deal? This conversation is feeling very one-sided. Deal? Deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一言为定了? 这次谈话根本没的商量。一言为定? 一言为定。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad? We had a deal!
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸? 我们说好的。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's not a deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，这买卖我不干。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me deal with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去对付他。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 协议; 约定; 交易

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经销商；发牌者；交易员；证券商；毒贩
n. 交易；生意往来；待人之道；关系

word_family.mean: v. 发；买卖；交易；处理；给予…；讨论；对待；给予；论及；发放

sense_info_list.en: take measures concerning someone or something, especially with the intention of putting something right

examination_example.sentence: Remember in <highlight>dealing</highlight> with any coworker what they appreciate from an interaction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在与任何同事打交道时，记住他们从互动中重视什么。

examination_example.sentence: Elected leaders must be allowed to help supporters <highlight>deal</highlight> with bureaucratic problems without fear of prosecution of bribery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 必须允许当选领导人帮助支持者处理官僚问题，而不必担心被起诉受贿。

examination_example.sentence: All the daily business has been promptly <highlight>dealt</highlight> with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有日常事务都得到了及时处理。

sense_info_list.en: an agreement entered into by two or more parties for their mutual benefit, especially in a business or political context
sense_info_list.zh: 协议; 约定; 交易

examination_example.sentence: However, critics say the big companies use such <highlight>deals</highlight> to buy their most threatening potential competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，批评人士表示，这些大公司利用此类交易来收购它们最具威胁性的潜在竞争对手。

examination_example.sentence: Without question, manufacturing has taken a significant hit during recent decades, and further trade <highlight>deals</highlight> raise questions about whether new shocks could hit manufacturing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，制造业在最近几十年遭受了重大打击，而且进一步的贸易协定引发了问题——新的冲击是否会重创制造业。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>deal</highlight> is a <highlight>deal</highlight>—except, apparently, when Entergy is involved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交易就是交易——很明显，除非涉及到Entergy公司。

examination_example.sentence: The really successful holders of such titles are those that do a great <highlight>deal</highlight> more than bring in high-profile arts events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些头衔的获得者中真正成功的是这样一群人，他们做了很多事，远不止举办高知名度的艺术活动。

examination_example.sentence: There is a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of this kind of nonsense in the medical journals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学杂志上有很多这种废话。

examination_example.sentence: "Many young people assume a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of personal responsibility for educating themselves and actively seeking out opposing viewpoints," the survey concluded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “许多年轻人在自我教育及积极寻求对立观点方面承担很多个人责任”，该调查总结道。

examination_example.sentence: Let's not forget sports—in male-dominated corporate America, it's still a big <highlight>deal</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们不要忘记体育——在男性主导的美国企业中，体育仍然是一件大事。

sense_info_list.en: take part in commercial trading of a particular commodity
the act of sharing out something, especially playing cards

word_usage.usage: deal指“协议”时，尤指贸易或政治上对双方有利的协议，是可数名词。

a great deal of表示“大量”，其后跟不可数名词。
示例：They spent a great deal of money.
他们花了大量的钱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: take measures concerning someone or something, especially with the intention of putting something right

examination_example.sentence: Moves by Barcelona and Venice to <highlight>deal</highlight> with the phenomenon of "over-tourism" through the use of charges have recently gained prominence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴塞罗那和威尼斯通过收费来解决“过度旅游”现象的举措备受关注。

sense_info_list.en: a significant but unspecified amount of something

examination_example.sentence: And this often leads to a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of mutual respect, whether it's with a colleague, an assistant or even a receptionist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是与同事、助理，甚至是接待员，这通常都会带来极大的相互尊重。

examination_example.sentence: It takes a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of effort to sustain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这需要很大的努力来维持。

examination_example.sentence: It helps a great <highlight>deal</highlight> in easing traffic congestion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它对缓解交通拥挤有很大帮助。

sense_info_list.en: take part in commercial trading of a particular commodity

examination_example.sentence: As far as I'm concerned, it's not a big <highlight>deal</highlight> if young generations choose pop stars as their idols.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就我而言，如果年轻一代选择流行歌星作为他们的偶像，这不是一件大事。

sense_info_list.en: the act of sharing out something, especially playing cards

word_usage.usage:
a great/good deal of表示“许多…”，只能修饰不可数名词，不能用来修饰可数名词。
示例：他给了我许多书。
误 He gave me a great deal of books.
正 He gave me a great number of books.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经销商；发牌者；交易员；证券商；毒贩

word_family.mean: v. 发；买卖；交易；处理；给予…；讨论；对待；给予；论及；发放

sense_info_list.en: take measures concerning someone or something; especially with the intention of putting something right

examination_example.sentence: How animals <highlight>deal</highlight> with lack of gravity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物如何应对失重。

examination_example.sentence: A representative for the firefighters told the local TV that removing the chocolate was worse than <highlight>dealing</highlight> with snow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消防队员的一名代表告诉当地电视台，清除巧克力比处理积雪更糟糕。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Somavia says the International Labour Organization is proposing a global job's agreement to <highlight>deal</highlight> with unemployment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索马维亚先生说，国际劳工组织正在拟定一项全球就业协议来解决失业问题。

sense_info_list.en: a significant but unspecified amount of something

examination_example.sentence: It is suffering a great <highlight>deal</highlight> from the incident.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一事件使它深受其害。

examination_example.sentence: This should matter a great <highlight>deal</highlight> to parents, teachers and policymakers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对家长、老师和政策制定者来说应该非常重要。

examination_example.sentence: David Reay, professor of carbon management, argues that, although microwaves use a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of energy, their emissions are minor compared to those from cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 碳管理学教授 David Reay 认为，尽管使用微波炉会消耗大量能源，但与汽车相比，它们的排放量微乎其微。

sense_info_list.en: an agreement entered into by two or more parties for their mutual benefit; especially in a business or political context

examination_example.sentence: Glasgow City Council has made a <highlight>deal</highlight> with ScottishPower on carbon emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格拉斯哥市议会与苏格兰电力公司就碳排放达成协议。

examination_example.sentence: I'm interested in booking a holiday to Australia and wonder if you could tell me what <highlight>deals</highlight> you have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我有兴趣安排去澳大利亚的假期，不知道你能否告诉我你们有什么协议。

examination_example.sentence: So, what sort of <highlight>deals</highlight> do you have for package holidays then?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，你有什么样的包价度假交易呢？

sense_info_list.en: take part in commercial trading of a particular commodity

examination_example.sentence: Retailers' refusal to <highlight>deal</highlight> in ebikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售商拒绝做售卖电动自行车的生意。

word_usage.usage:
a great/good deal of表示“许多…”，只能修饰不可数名词，不能用来修饰可数名词。
示例：他给了我许多书。
误 He gave me a great deal of books.
正 He gave me a great number of books.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指大规模的买卖或易货关系。
口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经销商；发牌者；交易员；证券商；毒贩
n. 交易；生意往来；待人之道；关系

word_family.mean: v. 发；买卖；交易；处理；给予…；讨论；对待；给予；论及；发放

examination_example.sentence: A history book which may contain the facts in story form will be easier to read than one <highlight>dealing</highlight> with scientific subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一本可能包含故事形式的事实的历史书将比涉及科学主题的书更容易阅读。

examination_example.sentence: Interruptions are one of the worst things to <highlight>deal</highlight> with while you're trying to get work done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你试图完成工作时，中断是最糟糕的事情之一。

examination_example.sentence: For years I <highlight>dealt</highlight> with my travel agent only by phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，我只通过电话与我的旅行社打交道。

examination_example.sentence: But if you have to read a great <highlight>deal</highlight> for study, you will appreciate the benefits of being able to read more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果你必须为学习而大量阅读，你会体会到能够更快阅读的好处。

examination_example.sentence: There is a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of pressure to master one's field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 掌握自己的领域有很大的压力。

examination_example.sentence: She spent a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of time visiting the poor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她花了大量的时间探访穷人。

examination_example.sentence: Some labor unions struck a <highlight>deal</highlight> with a group of companies limiting the number of hours that independent contractors can be on call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些工会与一些公司达成协议，限制独立承包商的待命时间。

word_usage.usage: deal with与do with都有“处理"的意思，但deal with 与how 连用，do with 与what 连用。

a good/great deal表示数量，它既可作宾语，又可修饰动词或者用来加强比较级的语气。如：
I have a great deal to do.
我有很多事要做。
She ran a good deal faster than I.
她比我跑得快多了。
a great/good deal of后只能接不可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 处理; 应付; 打交道
协议; 约定; 交易

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经销商；发牌者；交易员；证券商；毒贩
n. 交易；生意往来；待人之道；关系

word_family.mean: v. 发；买卖；交易；处理；给予…；讨论；对待；给予；论及；发放

sense_info_list.en: take measures concerning someone or something, especially with the intention of putting something right
sense_info_list.zh: 处理; 应付; 打交道

examination_example.sentence: While <highlight>dealing</highlight> with a stranger, you were polite, but with the daughter you love, you were unkind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在和陌生人打交道时，你很有礼貌，但和你爱的女儿在一起时，你很不友好。

examination_example.sentence: How did you <highlight>deal</highlight> with your problem?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是如何处理你的问题的？

examination_example.sentence: They help the bus to <highlight>deal</highlight> with complex (复杂的) road conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们帮助公共汽车处理复杂的路况。

sense_info_list.en: a significant but unspecified amount of something

examination_example.sentence: It is worth a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它值很多钱。

examination_example.sentence: So far, the hospitals have received a great <highlight>deal</highlight> of encouragement from the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，医院得到了公众的大力支持。

examination_example.sentence: But people make a big <highlight>deal</highlight> of flipping（ 翻动） over the calendar．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是人们很重视翻日历。

sense_info_list.en: an agreement entered into by two or more parties for their mutual benefit, especially in a business or political context
sense_info_list.zh: 协议; 约定; 交易

examination_example.sentence: It's not a big <highlight>deal</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没什么大不了的。

examination_example.sentence: So, many teenagers are getting experience working part-time, <highlight>dealing</highlight> with banks and deciding whether to save or spend their money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，许多青少年正在积累兼职工作、与银行打交道以及决定是存钱还是花钱的经验。

word_usage.usage:
a great/good deal of表示“许多…”，只能修饰不可数名词，不能用来修饰可数名词。
示例：他给了我许多书。
误 He gave me a great deal of books.
正 He gave me a great number of books.
